title: Say A Little Prayer
alternative_title: Herzenswunsch ; Say a Little Prayer ; Wish You All the Best ; Les vœux de l'Oméga ; Ruega por mí ; お祈りください〜私のためだけに〜 ; แด่คำวิงวอน ; 염원하소서 ; 心誠祈願
status: Herzenswunsch ; Say a Little Prayer ; Wish You All the Best ; Les vœux de l'Oméga ; Ruega por mí ; お祈りください〜私のためだけに〜 ; แด่คำวิงวอน ; 염원하소서 ; 心誠祈願
description:
Description :
        Saein is an omega with a single mission in life: to rescue his mother from the clutches of Geunhan Pharmaceuticals. In order to achieve this, he becomes the bonder of Yungeom, a wealthy alpha who needs an omega to stabilize his pheromones. It seems like there's hope for Saein and his mother as he grows closer with Yungeom, but what Saein doesn't know is that there is a frightening, ugly truth lying under the kind facades of the people who are his new family...
